reviewText: The BBC are so bullheaded on releasing videos in region 1.  I had to buy region 2 to finish the series.

If you warned me that this requires what a Region 2 DVD player - and I have no idea if you did or not - since I have no idea what a Region 2 DVD player is, the warning was not sufficient.  Now I've got to figure out how to return the darn thing.
This is one of my favorite British sitcoms.  I highly recommend it.  I should point out that this sitcom is probably more appealing to Seniors.

Last of the Summer Wine keeps getting better and better.  This series of the adventures of older men
is an entertaining and funny comedy.
Fits just fine in my British comedy collection of this show.
